Bulk Submission Form

The usage of this page requires an account. You can request an account here. See Getting Started for more details.

please use Chrome and Firefox for best results, IE is not supported at this time.

To only check eligibility for certain programs, list the comma separated program codes below. The full list of program codes can be accessed on the Benefits and Programs API page.

A sample CSV can be found on the Sample Data and Code page.

NYC Opportunity is the New York City Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity. We are committed to sharing open source software that we use in our products. Feel free to ask questions and share feedback. Follow @nycopportunity on Twitter, Facebook, Medium, and Github.
